Package pytils

source code

Simple processing for russian strings

Submodules [hide private]
  • pytils.dt: Russian dates without locales
  • pytils.numeral: Plural forms and in-word representation for numerals.
  • pytils.templatetags: Pytils templatetags for Django web-framework
    • pytils.templatetags.pytils_dt: pytils.dt templatetags for Django web-framework
    • pytils.templatetags.pytils_numeral: pytils.numeral templatetags for Django web-framework
    • pytils.templatetags.pytils_translit: pytils.translit templatetags for Django web-framework
  • pytils.test: Unit tests for pytils
    • pytils.test.test_dt: Unit-tests for pytils.dt
    • pytils.test.test_numeral: Unit-tests for pytils.numeral
    • pytils.test.test_translit: Unit-tests for pytils.translit
    • pytils.test.test_utils: Unit-tests for pytils.utils
  • pytils.translit: Simple transliteration
  • pytils.utils: Misc utils for internal use
